llm_text:
Why: The model flag is driven primarily by payment_format_ach (value=1; SHAP +2.81086), which strongly increased the score. Elevated transaction size—amount_paid (9226.42; SHAP +0.80825) and amount_received (9226.42; SHAP +0.72233)—further increased the score. Sending bank (from_bank = 233580; SHAP +0.25900) and transaction timing (hour = 17; SHAP +0.22502) also contributed positively. Payment_currency_us_dollar (value=1; SHAP -0.14984) modestly decreased the score but did not offset the positive drivers.

Conclusion: Based solely on the listed drivers, the combination of ACH format, the specific amounts (9226.42), the sending bank (233580) and the 17:00 hour produced a net increase in the model score and triggered the alert; USD currency presence slightly reduced the score. For further review, focus on the ACH payment characteristics (payment_format_ach), the identical paid/received amounts, the from_bank (233580), and the time (hour=17).
